div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 15px; margin: 30px 0;

a.style: padding: 20px; font-size: 1.1em; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; border: none; border-radius: 10px; cursor: pointer; display: block; text-decoration: none; text-align: center;
